analysis.description:
IcoPhaseManagement.close (/unique_chucks/5/0x8a187d5285d316bcbc9adafc08b51d70a0d8e000.sol#259-267) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- ! msg.sender.send(this.balance) (/unique_chucks/5/0x8a187d5285d316bcbc9adafc08b51d70a0d8e000.sol#266-267)

Reentrancy in IcoPhaseManagement.abandon (/unique_chucks/5/0x8a187d5285d316bcbc9adafc08b51d70a0d8e000.sol#294-330):
	External calls:
	- paymentPerShare = this.balance / smartInvestmentFundToken.totalSupply() (/unique_chucks/5/0x8a187d5285d316bcbc9adafc08b51d70a0d8e000.sol#300-302)
	- numberTokenHolders = smartInvestmentFundToken.tokenHolderCount() (/unique_chucks/5/0x8a187d5285d316bcbc9adafc08b51d70a0d8e000.sol#303)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- icoAbandoned (/unique_chucks/5/0x8a187d5285d316bcbc9adafc08b51d70a0d8e000.sol#320)

SmartInvestmentFundToken.tokenOwnerAdd.tokenHolderCount (local variable @ /unique_chucks/5/0x8a187d5285d316bcbc9adafc08b51d70a0d8e000.sol#520-521) shadows:
	- SmartInvestmentFundToken.tokenHolderCount (function @ /unique_chucks/5/0x8a187d5285d316bcbc9adafc08b51d70a0d8e000.sol#461-462)

SmartInvestmentFundToken.tokenOwnerRemove.tokenHolderCount (local variable @ /unique_chucks/5/0x8a187d5285d316bcbc9adafc08b51d70a0d8e000.sol#539-540) shadows:
	- SmartInvestmentFundToken.tokenHolderCount (function @ /unique_chucks/5/0x8a187d5285d316bcbc9adafc08b51d70a0d8e000.sol#461-462)

IcoPhaseManagement.abandon has external calls inside a loop:
	- addr = smartInvestmentFundToken.tokenHolder(i) (/unique_chucks/5/0x8a187d5285d316bcbc9adafc08b51d70a0d8e000.sol#308)

IcoPhaseManagement.abandon has external calls inside a loop:
	- etherToSend = paymentPerShare * smartInvestmentFundToken.balanceOf(addr) (/unique_chucks/5/0x8a187d5285d316bcbc9adafc08b51d70a0d8e000.sol#309-312)

	External calls:
	- paymentPerShare = this.balance / smartInvestmentFundToken.totalSupply() (/unique_chucks/5/0x8a187d5285d316bcbc9adafc08b51d70a0d8e000.sol#300-302)

	- addr = smartInvestmentFundToken.tokenHolder(i) (/unique_chucks/5/0x8a187d5285d316bcbc9adafc08b51d70a0d8e000.sol#308)
	- etherToSend = paymentPerShare * smartInvestmentFundToken.balanceOf(addr) (/unique_chucks/5/0x8a187d5285d316bcbc9adafc08b51d70a0d8e000.sol#309-312)
	State variables written after the call(s):
